devdoc.details: Implementation of DLoopWithdrawerBase with Odos swap functionality

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

params._flashLender: Address of the flash loan provider

params.initiator: Address that initiated the flash loan

returns._0: bytes32 The flash loan callback success bytes

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeem(uint256,address,address,uint256,u.details: Redeems shares from the core vault

params.dLoopCore: Address of the DLoopCore contract to use
params.minReceiveAmount: Minimum amount of assets to receive
params.underlyingToDStableSwapData: Swap data from underlying asset to dStable

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rescueToken(address,address).details: Rescues tokens accidentally sent to the contract

params.receiver: Address to receive the rescued tokens
params.token: Address of the token to rescue

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256,address,address,uint256.details: Withdraws assets from the core vault

params.dLoopCore: Address of the DLoopCore contract to use
params.minReceiveAmount: Minimum amount of assets to receive
params.underlyingToDStableSwapData: Swap data from underlying asset to dStable

devdoc.title: DLoopWithdrawerOdos
